body_html:
I am not sure whether this is by design since in get_model_variables it set the collection as ops.GraphKeys.MODEL_VARIABLES instead of tf.GraphKeys.GLOBAL_VARIABLES as @Tauranis did for tf.get_collection above.
@drpngx, could you please help confirm this?
body_text:
I am not sure whether this is by design since in get_model_variables it set the collection as ops.GraphKeys.MODEL_VARIABLES instead of tf.GraphKeys.GLOBAL_VARIABLES as @Tauranis did for tf.get_collection above.
@drpngx, could you please help confirm this?
body:
I am not sure whether this is by design since in [get_model_variables](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/framework/python/ops/variables.py#L338) it set the collection as ops.GraphKeys.MODEL_VARIABLES instead of tf.GraphKeys.GLOBAL_VARIABLES as @Tauranis did for tf.get_collection above. 
@drpngx, could you please help confirm this?
